name: Beastie Land
description:
Rob the hidden treasure with your beastie abilities and escape without getting caught!

Beastie Land is a FAST RETRO 8-BIT TREASURE PLATFORMER TODAY because...
  • it's a FAST action-paced game with no boredom! If you get bored I beg you to return it!
  • it's what you want to play, a full RETRO experience with those pixel graphics that you love.
  • it offers you the opportunity to listen to the best 8-BIT soundtracks in the market.
  • it's about addictive coin and TREASURE hunt collecting action.
  • it's got an enjoyable PLATFORMER design to make you chill in your couch.
  • it's about reliving the moment of the old school era with TODAY's technology.
